# Geospatial artificial intelligence (GeoAI) for remote sensing data

## GeoAI for spatial prediction of future bushfire 

### Future climate data collection

::: {.callout-tip title="Aim"}
We separately collected CMIP6 datasets of temperature and precipitation for 2024 and 2030. The 2024 data will be used for model training, followed by predicting bushfire burn areas for 2030.
:::

::: {.callout-caution title="Description of steps"}
1.	Load NEX-GDDP-CMIP6 data from Google Earth Engine.  
2.	Aggregate and export the temperature and precipitation data for 2024.  
3.	Aggregate and export the temperature and precipitation data for 2030.  
:::

```js
// 加载 CMIP6 数据集
var dataset = ee.ImageCollection("NASA/NEX/GDDP-CMIP6")
  .filter(ee.Filter.eq('model', 'ACCESS-CM2'))  // 选择模型
  .filter(ee.Filter.eq('experiment', 'ssp585'))  // 选择 SSP 情景
  .filterBounds(roi);  // 限制在研究区域
    // 选择 2050 年数据
 

// 提取变量
var temperature = dataset.select('tas');  // 日均气温(单位: K)
var precipitation = dataset.select('pr');  // 日降水量 (单位: kg m-2 s-1)


var tem24 = temperature.filter(ee.Filter.calendarRange(2024, 2024, 'year')).mean().clip(roi).subtract(273.15);  
var tem30 = temperature.filter(ee.Filter.calendarRange(2030, 2030, 'year')).mean().clip(roi).subtract(273.15); 
var pre24 = precipitation.filter(ee.Filter.calendarRange(2024, 2024, 'year')).sum().clip(roi).multiply(86400).multiply(365);  
var pre30 = precipitation.filter(ee.Filter.calendarRange(2030, 2030, 'year')).sum().clip(roi).multiply(86400).multiply(365);  


Export.image.toDrive({
  image: tem24,
  description: 'tem24',
  scale: 30000,
  region: roi,
  fileFormat: 'GeoTIFF'
});
Export.image.toDrive({
  image: tem30,
  description: 'tem30',
  scale: 30000,
  region: roi,
  fileFormat: 'GeoTIFF'
});
Export.image.toDrive({
  image: pre24,
  description: 'pre24',
  scale: 30000,
  region: roi,
  fileFormat: 'GeoTIFF'
});
Export.image.toDrive({
  image: pre30,
  description: 'pre30',
  scale: 30000,
  region: roi,
  fileFormat: 'GeoTIFF'
});
```
